name: Nutville Paradox
description:
[Disclaimer: All characters involved in sexual acts are 18+ and all sexual acts are consensual. You must be of legal age in order to play Nutville Paradox.]

Check out TopTierStory's Patreon for Status Updates, Fan Art, Sketches, and of course, the fastest access to New Chapters of Nutville Paradox!




With the disappearance of his father 6 years ago, Aaron Breaker found himself buried in his books trying to take advantage of the American Education system in order to lead a good life for him and his mother.

However, a brand new opportunity emerged as Aaron was accepted into Nutville Academy-one of the top high schools in the United States with linkage to the top colleges in the United States. But, as Aaron begins his new life in Nutville County and Nutville Academy, he soon realizes, that things are not what they seem.  And now, beautiful women with unmatched libido now surround him.

And these beautiful women are running some kind of scheme within Nutville County.

Can Aaron hold them off? Will he find out the secrets of Nutville Academy? Will his moral sanity be intact by the end of the journey..? Or will he simply become a paradox. Find out in Nutville Paradox!

New chapters release every month!

Current Chapter: Chapter 5

*All chapters will be made free after 7 day grace period for Patreons*

Meet the Characters:

Aaron Breaker

An 18-year-old young man who studies and works hard in order to make his mother proud. His father left him 6 years ago out of the blue and forced Aaron and his mother to live in sub-poverty.

Myra

Aaron's childhood friend who also mysteriously ends up in the same academy as Aaron Breaker. Outgoing and forthright, yet also kind and fair. She holds Aaron in a very high regard.

Baelin

Another 18-year-old young man who also attends Nutville Academy, although he's attended longer the academy than Aaron and Myra. He is sharp, confident, and always thinks three steps ahead.  

Fiona Banger

A 39-year-old blonde haired older-woman who sports an amazing bust. The largest bust in Nutville Country.  She is the current principal of Nutville Academy as of 6 years ago. Men often flock to her and is often talked about around town as the most "beautiful titan" of Nutville County.

Michelle Guzzler
A 38-year-old brunette-haired older woman who sports an incredible rumpy backside. The largest rump of Nutville County. She is a physical education teacher under the employ of Fiona Banger. Students constantly stare at her backside as she walks around the academy, with good reason of course.

Tanya Nutbuster

A 28-year-old brown-haired younger woman who is just as beautiful as her colleagues at Nutville County. She's known to be sweet and caring towards her students, and is well admired. Yet, she holds a very dark secret that would shock those who would admire her.
